content.title: 6 Varsh Se Adhik Aayu Ke Bahuviklang Aur Mansik Roop Se Aviksit Nisaktjan Ke Liye Sahayata Anudan Yojana
content.department: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
content.beneficiary: Disabled individuals above the age of six years
content.details: Chhe Varsh Se Adhik Aayu Ke Bahuviklang Aur Mansik Roop Se Aviksit Nisaktjan Ke Liye Sahayata Anudan Yojana aims to assist multiple handicapped and mentally underdeveloped persons above the age of six years who are unable to earn a living. The scheme provides ₹600/- per month as a grant-in-aid to help meet their special needs and provide financial support.
eligibility: The applicant should be a native of Madhya Pradesh.
The applicant should have a Certificate of 40 percent or more disability.
The applicant's name should be mentioned on the Samagra portal and verified on the Sparsh portal.
The applicant should have an age certificate for being above six years of age.
content.application_process: Applicants can apply for the scheme using the prescribed format and submitting the necessary documents either to the designated officer's office, the Gram Panchayat, or a Public Service Center. The application can be submitted both online and offline.
documents_required: Native resident certificate of Madhya Pradesh.
Certificate regarding one's disability as per the Persons with Disabilities (Equal Opportunities, Protection of Rights and Full Participation) Act 1995.

faqs.question: What is Chhe Varsh Se Adhik Aayu Ke Bahuviklang Aur Mansik Roop Se Aviksit Nisaktjan Ke Liye Sahayata Anudan Yojana?
faqs.answer: The objective of the scheme is to provide assistance to multiple handicapped and mentally underdeveloped persons above the age of six years who are unable to earn a living.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of this scheme?
faqs.answer: The government gives ₹600/- per month to handicapped and mentally underdeveloped persons.

faqs.question: Is this Scheme for all Indian citizens?
faqs.answer: No, only for the natives of Madhya Pradesh.

faqs.question: Is there any percent of disability?
faqs.answer: Yes, there are 40 percent or more disability.

faqs.question: Is there any age criteria?
faqs.answer: Yes, the applicant should be more than 6 years old.

faqs.question: What documents are required?
faqs.answer: 1. Age certificate 2. Native resident certificate of Madhya Pradesh. 3. Certificate regarding one's disability as per the Persons with Disabilities (Equal Opportunities, Protection of Rights and Full Participation) Act 1995.

faqs.question: Can I apply online?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can visit this website https://socialsecurity.mp.gov.in/# and follow the steps given in the scheme.

faqs.question: Can I apply offline?
faqs.answer: Yes, the designated officer, Gram Panchayat, or Public Service Center.

faqs.question: Is there any application fee for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there is no application fee for the scheme.

faqs.question: Is there any beneficiary category?
faqs.answer: Yes, there are General, Other Backward Caste, Scheduled Caste, Scheduled Tribe beneficiary categories.
